column2: Give me all your love now
column4: We might be dead by tomorrow
column6: I can't go on wasting my time
column8: Cause all I hear is I'm not ready enough
column10: And I can tell that you didn't have
column11: To face your mother,, losing her love
column16: I don't want to judge what's in your heart
column17: But if you're not ready for love
column18: How can you be ready for life?
column19: How can you be ready for life?
column21: So let's love fully and let's love loud
